Reason: 
Cheaters and Toxic

I've been playing CounterStrike since beta 1.2, right around 20 years ago.  Global Offensive added a competitive and ranking system which was something CS always needed.  Now, with the aging server infrastructure and disinterest in improving the games timing and physics, it has all but died.
I don't play CS anymore, except occasionally a few rounds of gungame on Source and GO only when my friends pester me enough. 
I don't think the game threatens to steal peoples souls like it did in my time, otherwise I would advise against playing it.  But as of now I suggest it because with a good group of at least 4 other friends that all get along this game can be more fun, challenging and interesting than anything else out there.
